At least one of the username or email fi: At least one of the username or email fields is required
In configuration mode, the entire column: In configuration mode, the entire column becomes transparent. In non-configuration mode, the entire column will be hidden. Even if the entire column is hidden, its configured default values and other settings will still take effect.
Not a valid cellphone number, please re-: Not a valid cellphone number, please re-enter
Password is not allowed to be changed: Password is not allowed to be changed
Please enter the same password again: Please enter the same password again
Please enter your username or email: Please enter your username or email
Please keep and enable at least one auth: Please keep and enable at least one authenticator
Subject: Subject
The authentication allows users to sign: The authentication allows users to sign in via username or email.
The maximum time limit allowed for refre: The maximum time limit allowed for refreshing a Token after it expires. After this time limit, the token cannot be automatically renewed, and the user needs to log in again.
The maximum valid time for each user log: The maximum valid time for each user login. During the session validity, the Token will be automatically updated. After the timeout, the user is required to log in again.
The notification channel used to send th: The notification channel used to send the reset password email, only support email channel
The password is inconsistent, please re-: The password is inconsistent, please re-enter
The password is incorrect, please re-ent: The password is incorrect, please re-enter
The passwords entered twice are inconsis: The passwords entered twice are inconsistent
The phone number has been registered, pl: The phone number has been registered, please login directly
The phone number is not registered, plea: The phone number is not registered, please register first
The username or email is incorrect, plea: The username or email is incorrect, please re-enter
The username/email or password is incorr: The username/email or password is incorrect, please re-enter
The validity period of each issued API T: The validity period of each issued API Token. After the Token expires, if it is within the session validity period and has not exceeded the refresh limit, the server will automatically issue a new Token to maintain the user session, otherwise the user is required to log in again. (Each Token can only be refreshed once)
Token validity period must be less than: Token validity period must be less than session validity period!
Unauthenticated. Please sign in to conti: Unauthenticated. Please sign in to continue.
User not found. Please sign in again to: User not found. Please sign in again to continue.
Your session has expired. Please sign in: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
defaultResetPasswordEmailContentHTML:
Hello {{$user.username}},

We received a request to reset the password for your {{$systemSettings.title}} account.

Please click the link below to set your new password:

Reset Your Password

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

Please note: For your security, this password reset link will expire in {{$resetLinkExpiration}} minutes.

If you encounter any issues resetting your password, please contact our support team.

Thanks,
The {{$systemSettings.title}} Team
defaultResetPasswordEmailContentText:
Hello {{$user.username}},

We received a request to reset the password for your {{$systemSettings.title}} account.

Please click the link below to set your new password:

{{$resetLink}}

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

Please note: For your security, this password reset link will expire in {{$resetLinkExpiration}} minutes.

If you encounter any issues resetting your password, please contact our support team.

Thanks, The {{$systemSettings.title}} Team
